item.title: Zen of Rust
item.description: Rust for Pythonistas The Zen of… Rust? Does rust follow the zen of python? Does it do it well? In this series we’ll take a look at some of rust’s most salient features and why you, as a pythonista, may come to really vibe with some of rust’s Zen. ðŸ¦€ (come on, doesn’t that crab look chill af?) The Zen of Python Long time Pythoneer Tim Peters succinctly channels the BDFLâ€™s guiding principles for Pythonâ€™s design into 20 aphorisms, only 19 of which have been written down.
